name: Pac Dude
description:
Pac Dude Is A Game That I Made That I Took Some Inspiration From Pac Man.  I Made Everything That Is In This Game.

Use The Arrow Keys To Move Pac Dude.

Collect All The 131 Bits (Yellow Squares) To Beat the King Ghost, Each Bit Adds 1 Point To Your Score, Cherries Add 10 Points To Your Score.  Avoid The Ghosts As Well.

It Is Fun.
